SYMPTOM_001.name: Sharp pain with overhead activities
SYMPTOM_001.clinical_significance: Common in impingement syndromes and rotator cuff pathology

SYMPTOM_002.name: Night pain disturbing sleep
SYMPTOM_002.clinical_significance: Highly suggestive of inflammatory or adhesive conditions

SYMPTOM_003.name: Progressive loss of range of motion
SYMPTOM_003.clinical_significance: Pathognomonic for adhesive capsulitis when in shoulder

SYMPTOM_005.name: Pain radiating down leg below knee

SYMPTOM_006.name: Numbness and tingling in dermatomal pattern

SYMPTOM_007.name: Weakness in specific muscle groups
SYMPTOM_007.clinical_significance: Suggests nerve root or peripheral nerve pathology

SYMPTOM_008.name: Catching or locking sensation
SYMPTOM_008.clinical_significance: Indicates intra-articular pathology or loose body

SYMPTOM_009.name: Giving way or instability
SYMPTOM_009.clinical_significance: Suggests ligamentous insufficiency or muscle weakness

SYMPTOM_010.name: Swelling after activity
SYMPTOM_010.clinical_significance: Common in degenerative and overuse conditions

SYMPTOM_011.name: Pain worse at start of activity, improves with warming up

SYMPTOM_014.name: Pain at rest
SYMPTOM_014.clinical_significance: May indicate inflammatory process or severe pathology

SYMPTOM_016.name: Unable to bear weight
SYMPTOM_016.clinical_significance: Red flag for fracture or severe injury

SYMPTOM_018.name: Throbbing pain
SYMPTOM_018.clinical_significance: Often indicates inflammation or vascular involvement

SYMPTOM_022.name: Pain with deep breathing or coughing
SYMPTOM_022.clinical_significance: May indicate rib or thoracic involvement

SYMPTOM_025.name: Skin color or temperature changes
SYMPTOM_025.clinical_significance: May indicate vascular or autonomic involvement

SYMPTOM_026.name: Pain worse with weather changes
SYMPTOM_026.clinical_significance: Common in arthritis and old injuries

SYMPTOM_028.name: Fatigue with minimal exertion
SYMPTOM_028.clinical_significance: May indicate deconditioning or systemic condition

SYMPTOM_030.name: Gradual onset pain without trauma
SYMPTOM_030.clinical_significance: Common in overuse or degenerative conditions

SYMPTOM_031.name: Clicking or popping sounds
SYMPTOM_031.clinical_significance: May be normal or indicate pathology

SYMPTOM_037.name: Feeling of heaviness in limb
SYMPTOM_037.clinical_significance: May indicate neurological or vascular issue

SYMPTOM_039.name: Pain worse at end of day

SYMPTOM_040.name: Sharp pain with initial weight bearing

SYMPTOM_044.name: Pain with sitting for extended periods
SYMPTOM_044.clinical_significance: Common in disc and postural conditions

SYMPTOM_046.name: Tenderness along bone
SYMPTOM_046.clinical_significance: May indicate stress fracture or periostitis

SYMPTOM_052.name: Pain with combined movements
SYMPTOM_052.clinical_significance: Suggests facet joint or disc involvement

SYMPTOM_060.name: Knee swelling within hours of injury

SYMPTOM_063.name: Heel pain with first steps in morning

SYMPTOM_067.name: Difficulty putting on socks or shoes

SYMPTOM_068.name: Low back pain with bending forward

SYMPTOM_097.name: Tinnitus
SYMPTOM_097.clinical_significance: May relate to cervical or TMJ

SYMPTOM_101.name: Audible pop at time of injury
SYMPTOM_101.clinical_significance: Pathognomonic for ACL rupture when in knee

SYMPTOM_102.name: Theater sign - pain sitting with knee bent

SYMPTOM_103.name: Shopping cart sign - relief when leaning forward

SYMPTOM_107.name: Coffee cup sign - difficulty lifting cup with straight arm

SYMPTOM_108.name: Shaking hands for symptom relief
SYMPTOM_108.clinical_significance: Classic behavioral sign in carpal tunnel syndrome

SYMPTOM_109.name: Bone-on-bone grinding sensation
SYMPTOM_109.clinical_significance: Indicates severe osteoarthritis with cartilage loss

SYMPTOM_111.name: Pain worse going downstairs than upstairs

SYMPTOM_112.name: Pain with resisted wrist extension
SYMPTOM_112.clinical_significance: Diagnostic test finding for tennis elbow

SYMPTOM_114.name: C-sign - cupping posterior hip with hand
SYMPTOM_114.clinical_significance: Classic sign for deep hip pathology

SYMPTOM_117.name: Locking - inability to fully extend joint
SYMPTOM_117.clinical_significance: Indicates displaced meniscal tear or loose body

SYMPTOM_126.name: Dyspnea on exertion
SYMPTOM_126.clinical_significance: Essential indicator for cardiac and pulmonary conditions

SYMPTOM_128.name: Peripheral edema
SYMPTOM_128.clinical_significance: Indicates fluid retention, heart failure, or venous insufficiency

SYMPTOM_130.name: Productive cough with sputum
SYMPTOM_130.clinical_significance: Indicates respiratory infection or chronic lung disease

SYMPTOM_132.name: Fatigue with minimal exertion
SYMPTOM_132.clinical_significance: Common in heart failure and pulmonary conditions

SYMPTOM_134.name: Oxygen desaturation with activity
SYMPTOM_134.clinical_significance: Objective measure of respiratory or cardiac compromise

SYMPTOM_140.name: Dysarthria or speech difficulties
SYMPTOM_140.clinical_significance: Common in stroke and neurological conditions

SYMPTOM_141.name: Cognitive fatigue
SYMPTOM_141.clinical_significance: Common in multiple sclerosis and brain injury

SYMPTOM_143.name: Autonomic dysfunction
SYMPTOM_143.clinical_significance: Common in spinal cord injury and Parkinson's

SYMPTOM_146.name: Delayed motor milestones
SYMPTOM_146.clinical_significance: Indicates developmental delay or neurological condition

SYMPTOM_147.name: Toe walking pattern
SYMPTOM_147.clinical_significance: May indicate cerebral palsy or idiopathic toe walking

SYMPTOM_150.name: Sensory processing difficulties
SYMPTOM_150.clinical_significance: Common in autism and developmental conditions

SYMPTOM_151.name: Urinary urgency and frequency
SYMPTOM_151.clinical_significance: Indicates overactive bladder or pelvic floor dysfunction

SYMPTOM_153.name: Diastasis recti separation
SYMPTOM_153.clinical_significance: Common postpartum condition affecting core stability

SYMPTOM_156.name: Allodynia (pain from light touch)
SYMPTOM_156.clinical_significance: Indicates central sensitization or nerve damage

SYMPTOM_157.name: Temperature sensitivity
SYMPTOM_157.clinical_significance: Common in complex regional pain syndrome

SYMPTOM_158.name: Lateral ankle pain with inversion movement

SYMPTOM_159.name: Point tenderness over anterior talofibular ligament

SYMPTOM_160.name: Pain walking on uneven surfaces
SYMPTOM_160.clinical_significance: Indicates functional ankle instability post-ATFL injury

SYMPTOM_163.name: History of ankle inversion injury mechanism

SYMPTOM_385.name: Relief with sitting or forward flexion

SYMPTOM_386.name: Pain worsens with extension and rotation

SYMPTOM_393.name: Pain over posterior superior iliac spine

SYMPTOM_396.name: Pain radiates to groin or thigh

SYMPTOM_397.name: Pain with getting out of car

SYMPTOM_401.name: Pain with transition from sitting to standing

SYMPTOM_407.name: Neck pain following motor vehicle accident

SYMPTOM_431.name: New weakness in previously affected muscles

SYMPTOM_453.name: Upper and lower motor neuron signs

SYMPTOM_472.name: Inability to close eye on affected side

SYMPTOM_484.name: Pain worse with chewing or talking

SYMPTOM_503.name: Chronic productive cough with purulent sputum
